content: HI all, i thing that is a very common question, but i dont found it. I installed zulip and create a realm, but i don know how to access as a super user of all system, please help me!!!!!!!!!!!
@Jorge Mansilla CENS can you explain a bit more what you're trying to do?

@Jorge Mansilla CENS can you explain a bit more what you're trying to do?

Thanks, i want for example delete messages, delete realm, manage users

Deleting a realm is only possible using the manage.py shell on the command line. The rest you can do using the "Manage organization" section. https://zulipchat.com/help/getting-your-organization-started-with-zulip may be what you're looking for?
great, and exist any site when explain all command hot to use?? for example "manage.py createsuperuser" what do this?? create a superuser for what??, sorry my question, but I am new on zulip
@Jorge Mansilla CENS Take a look through the help pages at https://zulipchat.com/help/ -- I think the "Users & Bots" section has what you need for managing users
If there are other things you want to do that you don't see there, this is the place to ask!
I'd recommend ignoring the list of commands that manage.py has. Most of those are internal details of the system, not really commands for a Zulip administrator to use.
(I'm not 100% sure what createsuperuser does, but my guess is that it's one of those and not something relevant for you to use.)
